item.description:
The first 10 people to sign up....

please make sure you want to do this and will be able to attend.

more details to follow..
item.how_to_find_us: Details to follow for August 2011 date.
item.why: The club will consist of 10 members who must make a 1 year committment. We'll meet on a Sunday afternoon starting in August 2011 and then Nov. 2011, Feb. 2012, and May 2012. The first book I will announce on the message board & calendar by May 15th.
item.name: Book Club 1
